member.name: M:CompuMaster.camm.WebManager.Utils.HTMLEncodeLineBreaks(System.String)
member.summary:
Converts all line breaks into HTML line breaks ("
")
member.remarks: Supported line breaks are linebreaks of Windows, MacOS as well as Linux/Unix.

member.name: M:CompuMaster.camm.WebManager.Utils.sprintf(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Replaces placeholders in a string by defined values
member.param: One or more values which should be used for replacement
member.remarks:
Supported special character combinations are \t, \r, \n, \\, \[
Supported placeholders are [*], [n:1..9]
Join all items of a NameValueCollection (for example Request.QueryString) to a simple string
A collection like Request.Form or Request.QueryString A string in front of a key The string between key and value The string to be placed at the end of a value A string containing all elements of the collection
